title: IndiaMart shares tumble 18% after Q2 results. Should you buy, sell or hold?
description: IndiaMart Share Price: The company also reported an 18% jump in its revenue on a year-on-year basis (YoY) at Rs 348 crore for the second quarter ended September 2024, which stood at Rs 295 crore in the same quarter of the previous fiscal year.
